original_title: Disney Sing-Along-Songs: The Lion King - Circle of Life
overview: Enjoy favorite musical selections from Disney's smash hit "The Lion King", plus brand-new songs from "The Jungle Book 2", "Beauty And The Beast", "Pinnochia" and more - plus, the option to sing along in three different languages. "The Lion King: Circle of Life" promises a rip-roaring good time with the cheeriest tunes around!
title: Disney Sing-Along-Songs: The Lion King - Circle of Life
